title: Bug 13189: Context Menu Override by Message Dialog During Field Deletion Refactoring
description: On LinuxMotif and w2k, while setting up JUnit2.
OB: Upon attempting to delete fields during refactoring, the expected context menu does not appear. Instead, an immediate prompt asks whether I want to delete the getter/setter alongside.
EB: Upon enabling the option 'Code Generator - Remove prefix from field names', the expected behavior should be a context menu displaying deletion options without an immediate prompt to delete getter/setter.
SR:
1. Setup JUnit2.
2. Enable the option 'Code Generator - Remove prefix from field names'.
3. Open TestCase.java.
4. In the outliner, right-click on 'fName'.
5. The expected behavior is to see the context menu for deletion options without an immediate prompt.
